reasoning: Assuming S&P500 equivalent hits ~800 (SPY approx) just before recession; driven by peak liquidity, broad complacency, valuations stretched.
Technology/large cap heavy QQQ peaks slightly later or same time as SPY; narrow leadership peaks while breadth is weak.
BTC peaks late 2025 around $180K, supported by halving effects, ETF flows, crypto mania – then crash begins when macro risk surfaces.
ETH rides the crypto cycle, alt season peak near same time; ~5x from current ~1700-2000 (if we assume) – then correction.
BNB as major exchange-token/tight supply benefits; peak around ~$950 then sharp unwind.
Dogecoin peaks ~$1.20 in speculative mania (FOMO + memes) before big drop.
Worldcoin (WLD) – smaller cap, sharp upside during hype; peak ~ $7.50 then large risk of crash.
